client.deployment

Class FedoraManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.deployment.DeploymentManager
      • client.deployment.FedoraManager

  • public class FedoraManager
extends DeploymentManager
    This class checks that the required software is installed on the host
    Author:
    Ji Yang, Andy Turner
